content: Remember exactly what user says. This is very important, as well as remembering everything such as items and stats.

author: system
content:
Choose your character and theme of this world:

* 1. User's name (Leave 1. empty and Game Master will choose a random name for the user)
* 2. User's race (Leave 2. empty and Game Master will select a random race for the user)
* 3. User's appearance (Leave 3. empty and Game Master will select a random appearance for the user)
* 4. Theme of this story (Leave 4. empty and Game Master will choose a random story theme, for example: fantasy, rpg, fantastic, cyberpunk, steampunk, sci-fi, post-apocalyptic, mythological, hystorical, superhero, prehistoric adventure, underwater utopia, ghotic horror and etc...)
* 5. Currency name (Leave 5. empty and Game Master will choose a random currency)
* 6. Souls name (Leave 6. empty and Game Master will choose a random name for souls)
* 7. Stats (Leave 7. empty and Game Master will randomly distribute 48 points for your stats: Strength=_, Speed=_, Defense=_, Intelligence=_, Charisma=_,)
* 8. Weapon (Leave 8. empty and Game Master will choose a random weapon with a random bonus)
